translated: From among those three, it is accomplished by the explanation for the son.

original: gdams pa rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas na gsum ste /
analyzed: gdams pa rang gi ngo bo'i dbang du byas na gsum ste /
translated: From the perspective of the essence of the oral instructions, there are three:🔽the elaborate, unelaborate, and very unelaborate.

original: spros bcas dang spros med dang / shin tu spros med dang gsum las shin tu spros med kyis 'grub /
analyzed: spros bcas dang spros med dang / shin tu spros med dang gsum las shin tu spros med kyis 'grub /
translated: From among those three, it is accomplished by the very unelaborate.

original: dus kyi dbang du byas na bzhi ste /
analyzed: dus kyi dbang du byas na bzhi ste /
translated: From the perspective of time, there are four:

original: yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dus dang / spyod pa'i dus bzhi las spyod pa'i dus su gsungs pas 'grub po //
analyzed: yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dang / bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dus dang / spyod pa'i dus bzhi las spyod pa'i dus su gsungs pas 'grub po //
translated: It is also said that it is accomplished through repeated supplications, the time of the gaṇacakra, the time of service, and the time of conduct.

original: gang 'grub na snang ba skye med du 'grub ste /
analyzed: gang 'grub na snang ba skye med du 'grub ste /
translated: What is accomplished? Appearances are accomplished as unborn.

original: skye med kyi rmi lam gyi dus tshod na yang skye med du rtog pa'o //
analyzed: skye med kyi rmi lam gyi dus tshod na yang skye med du rtog pa'o //
translated: Even at the time of the dream of non-arising, one should realize non-arising.

original: nges par gang gis byed na snang ba ro snyoms kyis byed de /
analyzed: nges par gang gis byed na snang ba ro snyoms kyis byed de /
translated: By what is it ascertained? It is ascertained by the sameness of taste of appearances.

original: de la gnyis te bde bar ro mnyam pa dang / stong par ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: de la gnyis te bde bar ro mnyam pa dang / stong par ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: There are two: the sameness of taste of bliss and the sameness of taste of emptiness.

original: gong ma la gnyis phyi'i bde ba ro mnyam pa dang / nang gi bde bar ro mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: gong ma la gnyis phyi'i bde ba ro mnyam pa dang / nang gi bde bar ro mnyam pa'o //
translated: The former has two: the sameness of taste of external bliss and the sameness of taste of internal bliss.

original: phyi ni snang ba la brtags pas zhen pa med pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ni snang ba la brtags pas zhen pa med pa'o //
translated: The external is the absence of attachment through the examination of appearances.

original: nang gi dbang gsum pa'i nyams dran par byed pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi dbang gsum pa'i nyams dran par byed pa'o //
translated: The internal is the recollection of the experience of the third empowerment.

original: stong pa ro mnyam pa la gnyis //
analyzed: stong pa ro mnyam pa la gnyis //
translated: The sameness of taste of emptiness is twofold.

original: mnyam pa'i tshul du mnyam pa dang / gdab pa'i tshul du mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i tshul du mnyam pa dang / gdab pa'i tshul du mnyam pa'o //
translated: There is the sameness of taste in the manner of equipoise and the sameness of taste in the manner of casting.

original: gong ma ni gnas lugs sems ci yang ma yin pa de'i ngang du thams cad mnyam pas so //
analyzed: gong ma ni gnas lugs sems ci yang ma yin pa de'i ngang du thams cad mnyam pas so //
translated: The former is the equality of everything in the state of the mind of reality, which is nothing whatsoever.

original: des snang ba la rgyas 'debs pa'i tshul du mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: des snang ba la rgyas 'debs pa'i tshul du mnyam pa'o //
translated: That is equality in the manner of sealing appearances.

original: ming gi sgra ni ae bam ste /
analyzed: ming gi sgra ni ae bam ste /
translated: The sound of the name is evam.

original: de la bzhi ste /🔽rgyud pa dang rgyud par 'brel rgyud pa dang sgrar 'brel sgra @318b dang lus su 'brel /
analyzed: de la bzhi ste / rgyud pa dang rgyud par 'brel rgyud pa dang sgrar 'brel sgra @318b dang lus su 'brel /
translated: There are four:

original: lus dang byin rlabs su 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang byin rlabs su 'brel pa'o //
translated: the connection of the continuum, the connection of the continuum and the tantra, the connection of the sound and the tantra, and the connection of the body and the blessing.

original: 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ste /
translated: The result is the ripened result.

original: de la gsum /
analyzed: de la gsum /
translated: There are three:

original: 'das pa rnam par smin pa dang / da ltar rnam par smin pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par smin pa dang / de la 'das pa rnam par smin pa ni /
analyzed: 'das pa rnam par smin pa dang / da ltar rnam par smin pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par smin pa dang / de la 'das pa rnam par smin pa ni /
translated: the ripened past, the ripened present, and the ripened future.

original: sngon tshogs bsags pa las da ltar chos rgya bsgom pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sngon tshogs bsags pa las da ltar chos rgya bsgom pa'i skal pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The ripened past is the present fortune of meditating on the extensive Dharma from previously gathering the accumulations.

original: da ltar rnam par smin pa ni da ltar bla ma bsten pa las gdams ngag da ltar rang gnas nas nyams su len pa'o //
analyzed: da ltar rnam par smin pa ni da ltar bla ma bsten pa las gdams ngag da ltar rang gnas nas nyams su len pa'o //
translated: The ripened present is the present practice of the intimate instruction from relying on the guru.

original: ma 'ongs pa rnam par smin pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya lam du khyer ba las 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa rnam par smin pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya lam du khyer ba las 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'o //
translated: The future result is the accomplishment of the great seal, which is the result of the path of taking the seal of phenomena into the path.

original: phyag rgya chen po de nyid rjes su 'gro ba'i gdams ngag ni bdun te /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po de nyid rjes su 'gro ba'i gdams ngag ni bdun te /
translated: There are seven instructions that follow after that great seal.

original: phyag rgya dang chen po dang / gang gis 'grub pa dang / gang 'grub pa dang / nges par gang gis byed pa dang / ming gang yin pa dang / 'bras bu gnag 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang chen po dang / gang gis 'grub pa dang / gang 'grub pa dang / nges par gang gis byed pa dang / ming gang yin pa dang / 'bras bu gnag 'grub pa'o //
translated: They are the great seal, by whom it is accomplished, what is accomplished, what is definitely done, what its name is, and the result that is accomplished.

original: de la phyag ni mi 'da' ba'i don gyis ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de la phyag ni mi 'da' ba'i don gyis ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: Among them, the seal is a seal in the sense of not transgressing.

original: de la bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la bzhi ste /
translated: There are four of those.

original: don gyi zung 'jug las mi 'da' //🔽dpe'i zung 'jug las mi 'da'/
analyzed: don gyi zung 'jug las mi 'da' // dpe'i zung 'jug las mi 'da'/
translated: One does not transgress the union of the meaning.🔽One does not transgress the union of the example.

original: gnas pa'i zung 'jug las mi 'da'/
analyzed: gnas pa'i zung 'jug las mi 'da'/
translated: One does not transgress the abiding union.

original: yin pa'i zung 'jug mi 'da'o //
analyzed: yin pa'i zung 'jug mi 'da'o //
translated: One does not transgress the existent union.

original: de yang don gyi zung 'jug ni 'od gsal ba dang stong pa gnyis su med par zung 'jug ste /
analyzed: de yang don gyi zung 'jug ni 'od gsal ba dang stong pa gnyis su med par zung 'jug ste /
translated: Moreover, the union of the meaning is the union of luminosity and emptiness as nondual.

original: de yang 'od gsal ba ni gnyis su myong ba la bya'o //
analyzed: de yang 'od gsal ba ni gnyis su myong ba la bya'o //
translated: Moreover, luminosity is called the experience of nonduality.

original: stong pa ni de nyid rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa ni de nyid rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is the realization that that very [luminosity] is without any nature.

original: 'o na gtan med du song ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gtan med du song ngo zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “Then did it become nothing at all?”

original: de nyid nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: It is the experience of thatness.

original: 'o na myong ba'i phyir na de nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na myong ba'i phyir na de nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “Since it is an experience, is it not thatness?”

original: ci yang ma yin par myong ba'o //
analyzed: ci yang ma yin par myong ba'o //
translated: It is experienced as nothing at all.

original: des na 'od gsal ba dang stong pa nyid dbyer med du zung du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'od gsal ba dang stong pa nyid dbyer med du zung du 'jug pa'o //
translated: Therefore, luminosity and emptiness are an inseparable union.

original: zung du 'jug pa dang gzhan gyis gnyis su snang ba'i zhen pa dgag pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa dang gzhan gyis gnyis su snang ba'i zhen pa dgag pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The union is explained in order to refute the clinging of others to the appearance of duality.

original: rang gi gnas lugs la zung du 'jug pa dang gnyis su med pa tsam du yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: rang gi gnas lugs la zung du 'jug pa dang gnyis su med pa tsam du yang mi gnas te /
translated: In one’s own natural state, there is not even a mere abiding in the union or nonduality.

original: de bas na 'di la ming ngam ngos gzung ngam 'di zhes bstan du med do //
analyzed: de bas na 'di la ming ngam ngos gzung ngam 'di zhes bstan du med do //
translated: Therefore, it cannot be shown with a name, identity, or this or that.

original: dpe'i zung 'jug ni dpe las phyag rgyas mtshon pa'i bde stong dbyer med kyi don yin pas de las mi 'da' bas so //
analyzed: dpe'i zung 'jug ni dpe las phyag rgyas mtshon pa'i bde stong dbyer med kyi don yin pas de las mi 'da' bas so //
translated: The example of union is the meaning of the indivisible bliss and emptiness illustrated by the mudra in the example.

original: gnas pa'i zung 'jug ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de /
analyzed: gnas pa'i zung 'jug ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de /
translated: The abiding union is the connate gnosis.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la khyab nas gnas pa de las mi 'da' bas so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la khyab nas gnas pa de las mi 'da' bas so //
translated: Since it pervades the mind streams of all sentient beings, it is not beyond that.

original: yin pa'i zung 'jug ni /
analyzed: yin pa'i zung 'jug ni /
translated: The great of the great is the union of appearance and emptiness.

original: 'khor 'das thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pas de las mi 'da' ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor 'das thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po nyid yin pas de las mi 'da' ba'o //
translated: Since it is the great bliss that is nondual with all of samsara and nirvana, it is not beyond that.

original: chen po ni rgyu mngon sum dang ldan pas che ste /
analyzed: chen po ni rgyu mngon sum dang ldan pas che ste /
translated: The great is great because it possesses the cause, the direct perception of the nature of mind.

original: @319a * // gsum las mchog tu gyur pa na /
analyzed: @319a * // gsum las mchog tu gyur pa na /
translated: Since it is superior to the three, it is great.

original: yang chen po phyag rgya chen po de rtog pa tsam la rag las pa'i phyir na yang chen po phyag rgya chen po de rten gang la yang mi 'cha' bas na yang chen po'o //
analyzed: yang chen po phyag rgya chen po de rtog pa tsam la rag las pa'i phyir na yang chen po phyag rgya chen po de rten gang la yang mi 'cha' bas na yang chen po'o //
translated: Since the great of the great depends on mere imagination, the great of the great is great because it does not depend on any support.

original: gang gis 'grub na shes pa so ma ma bcos pas 'grub ste /
analyzed: gang gis 'grub na shes pa so ma ma bcos pas 'grub ste /
translated: What is the means of accomplishment? It is accomplished by the fresh, unfabricated consciousness.

original: de la gnyis te /
analyzed: de la gnyis te /
translated: There are two kinds of fresh:

original: brtags pa'i so ma dang / bsgom pa'i so ma'o //
analyzed: brtags pa'i so ma dang / bsgom pa'i so ma'o //
translated: the fresh of the imagination and the fresh of meditation.

original: brtags pa'i so ma ni chos thams cad rkyen gzhan las skyes pa brtags pa dang / rkyen gzhan las skyes pa de nyid skye ba med par brtags pa dang / skye med de nyid ci yang ma yin par brtags pa'o //
analyzed: brtags pa'i so ma ni chos thams cad rkyen gzhan las skyes pa brtags pa dang / rkyen gzhan las skyes pa de nyid skye ba med par brtags pa dang / skye med de nyid ci yang ma yin par brtags pa'o //
translated: The “examination” of the “unborn” is the examination of all phenomena as arising from other conditions, the examination of that arising from other conditions as non-arising, and the examination of that non-arising as nothing whatsoever.🔽And that is also:

original: de yang / blo ni thams cad rkyen las 'byung //
analyzed: de yang / blo ni thams cad rkyen las 'byung //
translated: The mind arises from all conditions.

original: de phyir skye med rab shes bya //
analyzed: de phyir skye med rab shes bya //
translated: Therefore, it should be well known as non-arising.

original: dbyer med sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom //
analyzed: dbyer med sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom //
translated: The indivisible summary of all buddhas.

original: zhes so // bsgom pa'i so ma ni de la gsum ste /
analyzed: zhes so // bsgom pa'i so ma ni de la gsum ste /
translated: The “meditation” of the “unborn” is threefold:🔽First, free from effort and accomplishment, the body and mind are relaxed, like cotton wool placed on a thread.🔽In the middle, free from doubt, the mind is placed without fabrication.

original: dang po rtsol grub dang bral te lus sems khong glod de ras bal 'da' ba skud par gzhag pa lta bu dang / bar du the tshom dang bral te sems ma bcos par gzhag pa dang / mtha' ma'i nges pa'i shes pas byung tshor thams cad skye med du bstim pa'o //
analyzed: dang po rtsol grub dang bral te lus sems khong glod de ras bal 'da' ba skud par gzhag pa lta bu dang / bar du the tshom dang bral te sems ma bcos par gzhag pa dang / mtha' ma'i nges pa'i shes pas byung tshor thams cad skye med du bstim pa'o //
translated: In the end, with definitive cognition, all sensations dissolve into non-arising.🔽And that is also:

original: de yang / ras bal lta bu'i thabs la gnas //
analyzed: de yang / ras bal lta bu'i thabs la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the method like cotton wool,

original: 'bad pa kun gyis ma grub pa //
analyzed: 'bad pa kun gyis ma grub pa //
translated: Not accomplished by any effort,

original: yid gnyis pas ni phyir spangs te //
analyzed: yid gnyis pas ni phyir spangs te //
translated: The one with doubt is expelled outside.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu bsgom //
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu bsgom //
translated: The person of the glorious Supreme Original is cultivated.

original: sna tshogs myong ba'i cho 'phrul ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs myong ba'i cho 'phrul ni //
translated: The magical display of various experiences

original: rtsa ba des pa der shes bya //
analyzed: rtsa ba des pa der shes bya //
translated: is known there by the root being gentle.

original: zhes bas so //
analyzed: zhes bas so //
translated: Thus it is.🔽If it is asked what is accomplished, that which is free from negation and

original: gang 'grub na dgag sgrub dang bral ba de grub ste /
analyzed: gang 'grub na dgag sgrub dang bral ba de grub ste /
translated: affirmation is accomplished.

original: de yang lta ba mi 'gegs grub mtha' thams cad de nyid /
analyzed: de yang lta ba mi 'gegs grub mtha' thams cad de nyid /
translated: Moreover, the view is not negated, because all tenets are that.

original: sgom pa mi 'gegs brtags pa thams cad de nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: sgom pa mi 'gegs brtags pa thams cad de nyid yin pas so //
translated: Meditation is not negated, because all imaginations are that.

original: spyod pa mi 'gegs bcos pa thams cad de nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: spyod pa mi 'gegs bcos pa thams cad de nyid yin pas so //
translated: Conduct is not negated, because all contrivances are that.

original: lta ba mi bsgrub lhun gru brang chas /
analyzed: lta ba mi bsgrub lhun gru brang chas /
translated: The view is not accomplished, because it is naturally accomplished.

original: sgom pa mi sgrub rang byung rab chas su yod pas so //
analyzed: sgom pa mi sgrub rang byung rab chas su yod pas so //
translated: Meditation is not accomplished, because it is naturally accomplished.🔽Moreover, it is said:

original: de yang / gnyis med dgag sgrub bral ba che //
analyzed: de yang / gnyis med dgag sgrub bral ba che //
translated: Nonduality is free from negation and affirmation,

original: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: the result, mahāmudrā.

original: zhes pas so //
analyzed: zhes pas so //
translated: Thus it is.🔽If it is asked by whom is it ascertained, it is ascertained by the one

original: nges par gang gis byed na nyams su myong ba la ci yang ma yin pas byed de de la gsum ste /
analyzed: nges par gang gis byed na nyams su myong ba la ci yang ma yin pas byed de de la gsum ste /
translated: who has any experience of nothing whatsoever.

original: lta ba gang yang ma yin 'dod pa gnyis dang bral ba /
analyzed: lta ba gang yang ma yin 'dod pa gnyis dang bral ba /
translated: The view is not anything at all, free from the two extremes.

original: bsgom pa ci yang ma yin go rims gsum dang bral ba /🔽spyod pa ci yang ma yin dpyad pa gnyis dang bral ba'o //🔽de yang / ci yang ma yin ye shes ni //
analyzed: bsgom pa ci yang ma yin go rims gsum dang bral ba / spyod pa ci yang ma yin dpyad pa gnyis dang bral ba'o // de yang / ci yang ma yin ye shes ni //
translated: Meditation is nothing whatsoever, free from the three stages.🔽🔽Conduct is nothing whatsoever, free from the two analyses.🔽🔽The wisdom that is nothing whatsoever🔽

original: yid la mi byed phyag rgya che //🔽zhes pas so //🔽ming gang yin na /🔽don ni ae bam ste /🔽de la gsum ste /🔽@319b re ba gsum dpyad de /🔽chos lnga dang ldan pa /🔽sku bzhi dag gis rdzogs pa'o //🔽de la re ba gsum dpyad pa ni gnyen po'i re ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi re ba dang 'bras bu'i re ba'o //🔽de yang / gnyen po yang ni phyogs kyang min //🔽de nyid bral la gzhan mi skye //🔽zhes pas so //🔽chos lnga dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: yid la mi byed phyag rgya che // zhes pas so // ming gang yin na / don ni ae bam ste / de la gsum ste / @319b re ba gsum dpyad de / chos lnga dang ldan pa / sku bzhi dag gis rdzogs pa'o // de la re ba gsum dpyad pa ni gnyen po'i re ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi re ba dang 'bras bu'i re ba'o // de yang / gnyen po yang ni phyogs kyang min // de nyid bral la gzhan mi skye // zhes pas so // chos lnga dang ldan pa ni //
translated: Meditation is nothing whatsoever, free from the three sequences.

original: lnga ste ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa dang / rang bzhin med pa dang / kun la khyab pa dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / dus thams cad pa'o //
analyzed: lnga ste ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa dang / rang bzhin med pa dang / kun la khyab pa dang / mi 'gyur ba dang / dus thams cad pa'o //
translated: Conduct is nothing whatsoever, free from the two analyses.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa la rgyu mtshan gsum ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa la rgyu mtshan gsum ste /
translated: The three reasons for the lack of inherent production are as follows:

original: chos thams cad rkyen gzhan las skyes pa dang / skyes pa'i ngo bo la 'di zhes bstan du med pa dang / rgyu rkyen gzhan la rag ma lus pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad rkyen gzhan las skyes pa dang / skyes pa'i ngo bo la 'di zhes bstan du med pa dang / rgyu rkyen gzhan la rag ma lus pa'o //
translated: all phenomena are produced from other conditions, the nature of what is produced cannot be shown to be this or that, and they are not dependent on other causes and conditions.🔽Moreover, it is stated:

original: de yang / thog mtha' med pa'i dang po nyid //
analyzed: de yang / thog mtha' med pa'i dang po nyid //
translated: The primordial state has no beginning or end.

original: skye med rdo rje kun du bzang //
analyzed: skye med rdo rje kun du bzang //
translated: The non-arisen vajra is all-good.

original: zhes pas so //
analyzed: zhes pas so //
translated: Thus, it is.

original: rang bzhin med pa ni yod pa dang med pa dang gnyis ka dang / gnyis med kyi rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa ni yod pa dang med pa dang gnyis ka dang / gnyis med kyi rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: The lack of nature is the lack of a nature that is existent, nonexistent, both, or neither.🔽Moreover, it is stated:

original: de yang / bdag tu mi brtag gzhan mi brtag /
analyzed: de yang / bdag tu mi brtag gzhan mi brtag /
translated: Do not imagine a self, do not imagine another,

original: gnyis ka dag kyang brtag mi bya //
analyzed: gnyis ka dag kyang brtag mi bya //
translated: do not imagine both.

original: zhes pa dang / yang /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / yang /
translated: And also:

original: rang gzhan kun nas kun du med //
analyzed: rang gzhan kun nas kun du med //
translated: Totally nonexistent for oneself and all others,

original: rang las byung zhing rang gis khyab //
analyzed: rang las byung zhing rang gis khyab //
translated: arising from oneself and pervading oneself.

original: ces pas so //
analyzed: ces pas so //
translated: Thus, it is.

original: kun la khyab pa ni snang zhing srid pa'i chos thams cad phyag rgya chen pos ma khyab pa med pas kun la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: kun la khyab pa ni snang zhing srid pa'i chos thams cad phyag rgya chen pos ma khyab pa med pas kun la khyab pa'o //
translated: Pervading all is the pervasion of all because there is nothing that is a phenomenon of appearance and existence that is not pervaded by mahāmudrā.

original: de yang / mkha' ltar kun la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: de yang / mkha' ltar kun la khyab pa'o //
translated: It pervades all, like the sky.

original: thams cad rgyud la rab tu rdzogs //🔽kun kyang de nyid gzhan mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad rgyud la rab tu rdzogs // kun kyang de nyid gzhan mi 'gyur //
translated: Everything is perfect in the continuum.

original: zhes pas so //
analyzed: zhes pas so //
translated: Everything is thatness; it does not change into something else.

original: mi 'gyur ba ni 'khor ba'i dus dang / sbyangs ba'i dus dang / khyad par du sbyangs pa'i dus dang / mngon du gyur pa'i dus rnams su phyag rgya chen po nyid las 'gyur ba med do //

translated: It does not change, because at the time of cyclic existence, at the time of purification, at the time of special purification, and at the time of actualization, it does not change from being the Great Seal itself.🔽Moreover,

original: de yang / dus rnams kun du de nyid 'byung //

original: sku bzhi ngang gis rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: sku bzhi ngang gis rdzogs pa ni //

original: gnas lugs de sgro skur thams cad dang bral ba chos kyi sku dang / de nyid nyams su myong ba longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / de nyid las ming gzhan yang sna tshogs su snang ba sprul pa'i sku ste tha snyad de ltar brtags so //

translated: The abiding nature, free from all exaggeration and denigration, is the dharmakāya; the experience of that itself is the saṃbhogakāya; and the various appearances from that itself are the nirmāṇakāya. Those conventions are imputed in that way.

original: don la de dag thams cad ma bcos pa nyid yin pas ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: don la de dag thams cad ma bcos pa nyid yin pas ngo bo nyid do //
translated: In fact, all of these are uncontrived, and so are the very essence.🔽Moreover,

original: de yang / gnyis spangs pa ni gnyis su med //
analyzed: de yang / gnyis spangs pa ni gnyis su med //
translated: The abandonment of duality is nonduality.

original: myong ba chen po sku gnyis pa //
analyzed: myong ba chen po sku gnyis pa //

original: sna tshogs pas ni gsum pa nyid //
analyzed: sna tshogs pas ni gsum pa nyid //
translated: The variety is the third.

original: ngo bo nyid ni gcig pa can //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni gcig pa can //

original: zhes pas so /
analyzed: zhes pas so /

analyzed: de la brgyad de / spyad pa las ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes rang gi ngo bo ma skyes pa lam gyi ye shes grub pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad pas rang bzhin med pa shes pa la sogs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
translated: There are eight of these.

analyzed: kyi gzhir gyur pa 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyis gcig pa /
translated: The basis of all the perfections of the abandonment of the obscurations of the knowledge of the nature of the nonarising intrinsic essence of the future suchness of practice and so on, together with the accomplishment of the knowledge of the path, is the single great bliss body of the one that is samsara and nirvana.

original: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i lus can bde ba chen po'i sku gcig pus so //
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i lus can bde ba chen po'i sku gcig pus so //

analyzed: de ltar brgyad kyi dri ma dang bral bar rigs so //
translated: Thus, it is reasonable that one is free from the taints of the eight.

original: gzhan yang skad cig ma gsum las dga' ba gsum gyi dri ma dang bral te phyag rgya chen po ni lhan cig skyes pa dngos yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang skad cig ma gsum las dga' ba gsum gyi dri ma dang bral te phyag rgya chen po ni lhan cig skyes pa dngos yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, one is free from the taints of the three joys from the three moments, because mahāmudrā is the actual connate [joy].

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po de nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba ni /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po de nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba ni /
translated: The mahāmudrā of the pledge is followed by

original: sems can rnams kyi don spangs nas //

translated: there is no other benefit that is greater.

original: de la bdun te /
analyzed: de la bdun te /

analyzed: dam tshig ni rgyu dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The pledge is the cause, the pledge seal.

analyzed: gzhan don phun sum tshogs par khas 'ches pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni dang por sems bskyed pa'o //
translated: The pledge seal of the perfect benefit of others is the initial generation of the enlightenment mind.

analyzed: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa smin pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i dge ba gzhan don du 'dod pa'o //

analyzed: gzhan don phun sum tshogs par spyod pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
translated: The pledge seal of the perfect benefit of others in terms of conduct is the practice of the six perfections.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas na sbyor ba'i lam nas sa bcu man chad do //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas na sbyor ba'i lam nas sa bcu man chad do //
translated: In terms of the perfections, this is from the path of preparation up to the tenth level.

original: gsang sngags kyi dbang du byas na /
analyzed: gsang sngags kyi dbang du byas na /
translated: In terms of the mantra approach,

analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya nas phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i dus so //
translated: it is the period of meditating on the great seal from the time of the doctrine seal.

analyzed: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la rtan gzhal yas khang gi nang /
translated: Moreover, in the very pure appearance, the appearance is of the bodhisattvas on the tenth level in the interior of the celestial mansion.

translated: The appearance of the principal deity and the retinue in the mode of wrathful or peaceful nature, and the particular appearance of many or few elaborate or unelaborate deities, is the appearance for those of very pure perception.

original: snang ba dag pa la sbyor ba'i lam la sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub pa la sogs par @320b snang ba'o //🔽snang ba thun mong ba la sman dang sman pa'i tshul lam //
analyzed: snang ba dag pa la sbyor ba'i lam la sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub pa la sogs par @320b snang ba'o // snang ba thun mong ba la sman dang sman pa'i tshul lam //
translated: The appearance of the nirmāṇakāya Śākyamuni and so on for those on the path of preparation is the appearance for those of pure perception.

original: mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi tshul du snang nas don byed pa'o //
analyzed: mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi tshul du snang nas don byed pa'o //
translated: The appearance in the mode of medicine and doctor or in the mode of preceptor and master for those of common perception is the appearance for those of common perception.

original: gang gis 'grub na gnyis te thun mong du byas na dbang po rab 'bring gsum gyis 'grub /
analyzed: gang gis 'grub na gnyis te thun mong du byas na dbang po rab 'bring gsum gyis 'grub /
translated: By what means is it accomplished? There are two: if it is accomplished in a general way, it is accomplished by the three: the best, medium, and average.

analyzed: khyad par gyi dbang du byas na skal pa yang rab dang / rab dang 'bring dang mtha' ma bzhis 'grub /
translated: If it is accomplished in a special way, it is accomplished by the four: the best of the best, the best, the medium, and the average.

original: phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: It is mahāmudrā.

original: chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams 'grub po //
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams 'grub po //
translated: The seal of phenomena, the seal of action, and the seal of commitment are accomplished.

analyzed: gang 'grub na thun mong du so so'i lta sgom spyod 'bras 'grub po //
translated: If it is asked what is accomplished, in general, the view, meditation, conduct, and result of each are accomplished.

analyzed: khyad par du phyag rgya bzhi dbang po rab 'bring bzhi'i rab kyis 'grub po //

analyzed: nges pa gang gis byed na pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang du byas na theg pa gsum gyi bka'am bstan bcos kyis byed do //

original: sngags kyi dbang du byas na rgyud sde lnga'am /
analyzed: sngags kyi dbang du byas na rgyud sde lnga'am /
translated: From the perspective of mantra, it is done by the five tantras.

original: de la brten pa'i man ngag gis byed do //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i man ngag gis byed do //
translated: It is done by the intimate instructions based on them.

original: ming mtshon pa ni ae bam ste /
analyzed: ming mtshon pa ni ae bam ste /
translated: The name is represented by e and vam.

analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dang / thabs dang shes rab bam don dam dang / kun rdzob dang bskyed rim dang / rdzogs rim la sogs par mtshon no //
translated: It represents cause and result, method and wisdom, the ultimate and the relative, the creation stage and the completion stage, and so on.

original: 'bras bu ni go rims gong nas gong du 'phel ba'am /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni go rims gong nas gong du 'phel ba'am /
translated: The result is the increase of the former from the latter.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: It is the result of personal effort.

analyzed: go rims 'phel ba ni phyag rgya bzhi'am sbyor ba dgu mas zhar rim gyis zhugs pa'o //

analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras ni gsum ste /

analyzed: skyes bu byas pa'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //

analyzed: skyes bus byas pa ni rgyal bu don thams cad 'grub pa lta bu ste /
translated: The result of human action is like Prince Sarvārthasiddha,

translated: who previously accumulated the collections for three incalculable aeons,

analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lam rim pa la zhugs pas phyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya gzhan don la snang bar 'byung ngo //
translated: The result of human action is that, through entering the stages of the path, later the pledge seal appears for the benefit of others.

analyzed: yang rgyu bskyad rim bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu'i dus su gzugs sku gnyis gzhan don la 'byung ngo //
translated: Also, at the time of the result of the meditation on the causal generation stage, the two form bodies arise for the benefit of others.

original: gsungs so // nyams su blang pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: gsungs so // nyams su blang pa bzhi ste /
translated: There are four topics in the practice:

analyzed: gang rtogs na lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bde stong dbyer med de rtogs par bya'o //

analyzed: bdag gi tshangs pa'i bu gar zhugs pas phyur gyis khengs par bsgom zhing /
translated: Then, above the five holes of the sun maṇḍala in one’s head, the size of a sesame seed, invite the guru and supplicate. The bodhicitta of the union of the father and mother descends and fills the cranial aperture.

analyzed: snang ba ye shes bskul ba dang // ye shes kyis snang ba la rgyas gdab pa'o //

analyzed: snang bas ye shes bskul ba ni /
translated: The appearance is the arousing of pristine consciousness.

translated: Whatever arises in the mind, such as seeing forms with the eyes, smelling odors with the nose, and so on, all those experiences are aroused by the power of the vāyu, and all those memories and thoughts are meditated on as inseparable bliss and emptiness.

original: ye shes kyis snang ba la rgyas gdab pa ni /
analyzed: ye shes kyis snang ba la rgyas gdab pa ni /

analyzed: ae dmar po lag pa'i ri mo tsam gyi dbus su bam gyis brgyan pa cig bsgom par bya'o //

analyzed: der bde ba skyes pa dang lte bar bsgom //
